name: 121 DELUXE
description:
An enhanced version of the original experience consisting of 121 DELUXE cells. Use F4 to toggle fullscreen. Tap ESCAPE to save and quit. Hold ESCAPE to restart.

This game features a handful of helpful features and roughly 15 new cells to explore and interact with. This game was designed for a live performance that took place in summer of 2015.

If you are looking for the free version of the game, check out 121!

If you enjoy the soundtrack, you can listen to it freely or pay what you want here! Some music that was posted to the performance's facebook page has been compiled and is available for listening or download here!
